price: 54. Cuna oo daaqsada xoolihiinna, hubaal, waxaa arrinkani ugu sugan calaamooyin (muujin Awoodda Alle  iyo mudnaantiisa Keligi cibaadada) ciddii leh caqli fayow.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
